data.name: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 - ASIA Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Snipers of the world, unite! Bring your homeland to Kuamar with these exclusive Asian flag weapon skins.

Features:
  • Thailand (weapon skin)
  • China (weapon skin)
  • Turkey (weapon skin)
  • Korea (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
